title: I DON'T GET ANY CHAMPS IN THE CAPSULE FIX THIS RIOT!!!!
body: So I've been leveling up, i leveled up 5 times, so you know how we're suppose to get champs in those capsules right, but i don't get champions i get 200 blue essence every time, like come on, like fix this riot, i want champions, BRING BACK THE IP SYSTEM CHEESUS

replies.body: Unless you're talking about a different account I'm not aware of, this one is currently banned and hasn't been able to level up. What account were you referring to?
